Date: Friday, 1/31/1983
Subject: Your offer sounds good
I have to admit that I like your offer.
So far, it's the best one I've received.

Regards,
Gordon Pineiro

Date: Friday, 1/31/1983
Subject: Trade offer
Dear Sir,
I would like to offer you following trade:
LF Stephen Legge, SP Jorge Segura
in return for
3B Ediberto Rivera.

Please let me know if you accept!

Best Regards,
Plum Grove GM



Date: Monday, 2/3/1983
Subject: Thank you, I'll sign!
Your contract offer is really what I'm looking for.
I'm looking forward to playing with Wisconsin!

Regards,
Gordon Pineiro



Date: Monday, 2/3/1983
Subject: Contract offer
Please increase the number of years in your
offer. 2 years is definitely not enough!

Regards,
Ronald Dyer



Date: Thursday, 2/6/1983
Subject: I'll sign elsewhere
Sorry, Bay City has made the best overall offer.
I'll sign with them. Good luck this season!

Regards,
Ronald Dyer

Your scouting director

hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Team Doctor
